item.title: Node.js on FreeBSD
item.description: The above works like a charm when it comes to installing nodejs on FreeBSD !

item.title: Jailed in FreeBSD
item.description: Well, working on freeBSD right now some immediate learnings for most linux users Ports is as good as apt-get [and i would say much better, when i started installing stuff] You will need to start with installing vim and bash to make your life a lot easier So the target was to install python and nginx, both of which are very easy to install once you understand how the whole ports collection system works.
